script.dialog: Wake up, young Zaraden.
This Unit has acquired new information for you.
Trees... can be scary...
|shake|Huh!     |norm|I'm awake!
Oh sorry.      Little Robot?|!||L|What are you doing here so early?
This Unit has acquired new information for you.
Okay, what is it?
This Unit will now explain |C3|tetrids.
All unloved monsters are currently suffering from an affliction known as |C3|fear.|C0|
|C3|Tetrid motes|C0| are formed when |C3|fear|C0| is crystallized within a monster.
Is that what those |C3|shiny little flakes|C0| that fall off of the monsters are called?
That is correct.
The heart of this Zaraden has the ability to extract those |C3|motes|C0| from a monster.
Each type of monster will drop a certain color of |C3|tetrid motes|C0| when they are loved.
|C3|Example:|C0| Monsters of the |C3|Veyeral|C0| type will always have |C3|purple motes.
The heart will automatically refine these |C3|motes|C0| into powerful |C3|tetrids|C0| of the same color.
|wave|That is wonderful.
But,    what do I do with those?
This Unit will now explain how to |C3|radiate gifts and monsters.
When you love a new monster or receive a new gift, they will be added to the |C3|Collection Menu.
At this point, you will still forget that particular gift or monster every time you wake up.
I am...     having trouble...     remembering... things.
If you have enough of the correct |C3|tetrids,|C0| then you can |C3|radiate a card in the Collection menu.
Information about a gift or monster will no longer appear as |C3|???|C0| after it has been radiated.
The resulting flash should burn the memory of that object into your brain permanently.
Shiny.     Burn.     Got it.
The radiation flash should also fully wake the young Zaraden.
|shake|I'm awake!
Hey Little Robot,     where are you getting this advice from?
This Unit has always had this information in her memory.
This Unit is programmed to dispense information at the optimal time.
And you chose to wake me up and tell me now?
That is correct.
|wave|Thank you.|norm||!||L|I like waking up early.
This Unit was afraid that she had upset you.
Of course not.
|wave|I love you.
This Unit will now collapse into flames.
